sections.MISSION: Comanche Troop, 1ST SQDN conducts a M240 qualification range at Range 114 on 25- 26 November 2024 IOT qualify Soldiers with the weapon system and prepare gunners for SQD LFX.
sections.PURPOSE: of this operation is to qualify soldiers on the M240 machine gun IOT build confidence and lethality while simultaneously setting conditions for SQD LFX.
sections.KEY TASKS:
– Properly zero all M240s
Qualify all gun teams on tables I, II, and III according to TC 3-22.240
sections.EXECUTION:
All range participates will attend a safety brief by Range OIC and RSO prior to range operations. Firers and Assistant Gunners will use the principles of direct fire control IAW TC 3-22.240 IOT engage targets from 100 to 800 meters. Range OIC/NCOIC and safeties will ensure all equipment and soldiers are accounted for upon completion of each iteration and range operations. Firers will receive 50 rounds to verify zero at 10m, 50 rounds for confirmation of zero at 500m, then receive 200 rounds to qualify day. If firer’s fail to qual the first time, they will receive remedial training by coaches. Only coaches will re-certify firers for a second and third attempt at qualifying. Only firers who qualified during day will shoot at night, night shoot will consist of 200 rounds to qualify with.
CL I- M-M-M
CL III- N/A
CL IV- 10X Packs IR Chem lights
CL V – A131 DODIC: 6000 7.62 caliber CL VIII – Individual IFACs and CLS for medic
Task to Subordinate Units
1 PLT- 2X PAX gate guard requirement, 1X lane safety 2 PLT– Provide one lane safety, 2 PAX ammo detail 3 PLT–Range OIC, RSO, tower graders, ammo detail NCO
HQ – CASEVAC vehicle with medical support
4.
sections.COORDINATING INSTRUCTIONS:
The Uniform for this event will be OCPs with boots, gloves, eye pro, ACH, ear pro, NVGs, IOTV with plates, knee pads, and hydration source, BINOS
Each PLT will ensure all Soldier’s are in Dragoon standard and have received M240 PMI and familiarization.
5.
